posts.description: For some, the satiric ‘Colbert Report’ is a trusted source of political news | Pew Research Center
posts.extended: RT @moneyries: More American adults have heard of the Colbert Report (62%) than @NPR (53%), @TheEconomist (34%) and @BuzzFeed (31%)

posts.description: Nasa just emailed a wrench to space (Wired UK)
posts.extended: "This is the first time an object has been designed on Earth and then transmitted to space for manufacture."
